Title: Long live the victory of the proletarian revolutionary line with Chairman Mao as its representative! Long live the victory of Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution!
Notes: Madame Mao, Jiang Qing, is depicted as healthy, smiling and young on the extreme right of this poster that features the main leaders of the Cultural Revolution. She stands next to Chen Boda, Mao's long-standing private secretary (second from right). The other leaders on this poster are, from left, Kang Sheng, head of the Secret Service (and allegedly Jiang's erstwhile lover); Zhou Enlai, prime minister and secretary of state; Mao; Lin Biao, secretary of defense and the mastermind behind Mao worship; Chen Boda; and finally Jiang.A different edition of this poster is E12/589-590.
